subject: Arthur Morris,
body:
Arthur Morris,
Public Bureau For Claims Settlements
Area C Gariki,
Abuja.
29/06/2021
Ph:+ 234-803-759-5393
Good morning to you my brother and how are you doing, i sent to you
two bank account that you never made use of, and that was why i felt
that you have issue with the account, you informed me that the first
account did not go through then i sent the second and never heard from
you, i called severally but no answer, i wonder what is going on when
my office had made all arrangement for the booklets to get to you and
then the release of funds, please let me know something from your end
and give me your direct contract numbers, i shall wait your urgent
reply to know what will go through at your end before i send another
account, possibly call me, if you are not interested in this matter
please let me know, we are just working for the good and benefit of
your transfer, give me answer now.
+ 234-803-759-5393
Thanks

subject: Re:   Arthur Morris,
body:
Dear Arthur Morris,

I apologize for the confusion. I have been dealing with some personal matters and haven't had the chance to respond to your previous messages. 

Regarding the bank accounts, I am still interested in proceeding with this matter. However, I would appreciate if you could provide more details about the next steps and how we can ensure a smooth transfer process.

Here are my contact numbers:

Home: +1-202-555-0184
Mobile: +1-202-555-0185

Please feel free to call me at your earliest convenience so we can discuss this further.

Best wishes,
Miguel
